name: iClef - Sight Reading & Note Recognition Your Way
name_original: iClef - Sight Reading & Note Recognition Your Way
description:
The ONLY adaptive iOS game of its kind that lets you use an onscreen piano, a MIDI keyboard, or a REAL-WORLD instrument to improve your music reading comprehension in any key. Your real-world skills WILL improve if you use this app!

FEATURES
- Show (or don't!) note names on notes and/or piano keys for beginners
- Adapts to your game-play to give you notes you need to work on
- Position the onscreen piano and resize keys as you want them
- Use a Bluetooth or wired MIDI instrument (Optional)
- Use REAL instruments (regardless of their key) via microphone (Optional)
- Gives you stats and suggests notes for improvement after each game
- Play in ANY key signature
- Great piano sound
- Set your own note range
- Increase accidentals as you improve
- Pick the clef or clefs you want
- Saves all game configurations you choose + high scores (until you want to delete them)
- Works with your device upside down (in case you have plugged in an external keyboard)

iClef is the only app with these unique features. While this app alone will not teach you how to play a Bach cantata, it absolutely WILL add speed to your note recognition skills.
